title: South Korea crafts bill to freeze North Korea crypto assets
description:
The South Korean government plans to submit a bill that will enable it to track and freeze crypto assets used by North Korea for its weapons program, local media outlet Korea JonngAng Daily reported on Sept. 4. The National Intelligence Service initially introduced the bill in Nov. 2022. Subsequently, President Yoon Suk Yeon issued orders […]

The post South Korea crafts bill to freeze North Korea crypto assets appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Hawaii Man Charged for Making False Security Fund Conversion to Crypto Claims
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has charged a Hawaiian resident for falsely claiming that his fraudulent security would become the “first publicly traded security fund to convert to a cryptocurrency.” According to the Commission, the man promoted the security to boost its price and bolster the value of his portfolio. Fabricated Documents Used to […]

title: Swyftx launches ‘earn and learn program to educate Australians about crypto scams
description: Australian crypto exchange Swyftx is set to unveil its new “Earn and Learn” crypto education platform on September 6. The platform is designed to educate users about various crypto scams and reward them for completing courses. Swyftx aims to equip the public with essential knowledge about cryptocurrencies and scams as the industry awaits full regulation. ... Read more

title: ADA Analyst Compares ADA’s Journey to Amazon’s Early Years
description:
A tweet by the cryptocurrency analyst and trader Dan Gambardello published earlier today has drawn intriguing parallels between Cardano’s early stages and the formative years of the e-commerce giant Amazon. While the differences between the two are stark, there are valuable lessons ADA holders can glean from Amazon’s past, noted the analyst. In his tweet, […]

The post ADA Analyst Compares ADA’s Journey to Amazon’s Early Years appeared first on Coin Edition.
